Hello everyone This is my opinion about the game "Counter Strike Global Offensive". 

The game itself is not bad as a shooter - it's just perfect. But in my review I will tell not only about her good side, but also about what she is really bad about.                                          

Advantages: in this game - high online, thanks to this, the selection of games is simply gorgeous and fast. Not in all shooters you can see such a large selection of modes, such as: Deathmatch, MatchMaking, Partners and normal. In the game, for an additional fee, you can purchase an operation if you get bored with all the modes anyway. 

Shortcomings: a large pipeline of people playing with cheats. This shooter is full of people playing with third-party programs, namely: WallHack, Aim, RadarHack, Bhop and others. But, there are third-party sites where cheaters are 1%, and immen Faceit, Esea. There are sooo few cheaters there. (This is personal advice for honest players). 2 - a lot of toxic players. If you don't kill the opponent - report + insults. Speaking of reports. This is a trust factor system, it's a bit dumb, if an honest player gets a lot of reports, then he will only play with cheaters. He will not be able to get to the green trust factor anymore. (Only watching patrol).                          

-Play CS:GO?                                           
- It's your business. Download, play 1-2 skating rinks in mm, decide. Is it worth buying prime status. Personally, I have played and will play cs, for me it's like an amusement park, after school to relax is the most!
